column1: I like the app concept but I can not find how to create a new file.
I'm not android or java developer then I'l not send any PR.
I hope you will get some time to fix #1 and add this feature ;)"

losttime/cooper,open,Can't traverse more than one directory,"[Label(name=""bug"")]","Hello, I think this app is promising but doesn't quite work yet as I can only click on one directory, and no subdirectories so I can't use the app yet. Any chance of an update?
